card_sections.header: There’s a story behind every flavor.
card_sections.sub_header: ofi delivers the sustainability, traceability and surety of supply customers need and demand

cards.header: #1 dried onion producer in the world
Garlic: stronger flavor profiles mean real cost savings
Supplying spices that give recipes a real boost

knowledge_sections.header: Sustainability is the #1 priority at ofi
knowledge_sections.body: From the world’s most sustainable onions to garlic with bigger taste, from delicious pepper from Vietnam, to Turmeric and Cumin from India, ofi reduces water and pesticide usage across all suppliers to help you deliver excellence from farm-to-shelf.

knowledge_sections.header: See to the source, with AtSource
knowledge_sections.body: With the AtSource app, ofi gives customers detailed social and environmental data, providing full transparency and traceability at every step from plant to palate.

ofi lets customers tap into a universe of product potential with research, development and innovation facilities centered in 18 locations continuously cross-pollinating concepts from market-to-market around the world.

call_to_action_section.header: Schedule a consultation with a spice expert.
call_to_action_section.body: Get a free Traceability and Sustainability audit of all the herbs and spices you're using today.
